explains: vt. 勾引；引诱；对……说话；搭讪

sentences.en: The child was told how to accost the servants and the governess.
sentences.cn: 孩子被告知如何招呼仆人和家庭教师。

sentences.en: She wandered on from street to street, not daring to accost any of the busy people.
sentences.cn: 她从一条街走到一条街，不敢招呼任何一个忙碌的人。

sentences.en: I would not accost him yet.
sentences.cn: 但时机未到，我还不想招呼他呢。
